generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Value of Exposure to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises = ((Direct Exposure (addition) + Indirect Exposure (addition))" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Direct Exposure (addition) = (Micro Enterprises + Small Enterprises + Medium Enterprises)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Indirect Exposure (addition) = (Micro Enterprises + Small Enterprises + Medium Enterprises)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total exposure = (Funded Exposure + Non-Funded Exposure)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Exposure to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises = ((Direct Exposure (addition) + Indirect Exposure (addition) for number of accounts)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Direct Exposure (addition) = (Micro Enterprises + Small Enterprises + Medium Enterprises) for number of accounts" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Indirect Exposure (addition) = (Micro Enterprises + Small Enterprises + Medium Enterprises) for number of accounts " do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Loans outstanding = (Loans sanctioned for amounts of Rs.30,000 and below + Loans sanctioned for amount exceeding Rs.30,000)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total No. of Accounts = (Loans sanctioned for amounts of Rs.30,000 and below + Loans sanctioned for amount exceeding Rs.30,000)" do not tally.
Reporting of "Status of Loan" is mandatory, if "Amount" is reported.
"Total Capital and Liabilities" should be less than to Rs. 5,000,000,000
